verbose_text: However, in our study we tried to exclude this divergence by utilizing the p38 inhibitor, SB203580, which diminished the rhMFG-E8-induced down-regulation of neutrophil migration, hence suggesting a negative regulatory role of p38 in IL-8-mediated neutrophil migration upon stimulation with rhMFG-E8.
evidence: SB203580, which diminished the rhMFG-E8-induced down-regulation of neutrophil migration, hence suggesting a negative regulatory role of p38
